Havotron smiled.  Once again his best bot proved hismelf worthy to 
wield Havotron in his weapon mode shall he ever need to transform ot 
that.  He then looked to the new fight that was about to commence. He 
took aim and fired.  
Quake slammed into the wall first from the punch of nightmare than 
from the blast of Havotrons cannon.  "Nightmare, no more need to 
fight. Your brother is fine, although he is weaker than any 
Decepticon i have ever met.  Quake, you showed loyalty to me and I 
only hsot you because I knew you could take it right?" He said with a 
smirk.

Quake stood up, all of a sudden feeling important. "R-right" he 
said.  Then as he walked away he let less then accedent kick to 
Jagged.  Then continued walking. 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> "It won't work Havotron, I have you in my sights." Slugslinger 
smiled.
> "Your dead." he then pulled the trigger, and a blast of energy 
erupted,
> but not from Caliburst, this blast hit Caliburst before he could 
fire,
> and sent the gun tumbling to the ground. Slugslinger looked up,
> disarmed, his hand smoking, and fear covered his face, as he nelt 
to his
> knees. "Forgive me he cried."
> 
> Spinister stood just away, Singe smoking from the heat blast he just
> did. His aim was just as impecable.
> 
> Jagged was nailed in the jaw, and fell to the ground. A quiet noise
> burst from behind. "No one touches my little brother." Behind Quake
> smoke began to enter the room, then Nightmare did. His knight like
> helmet showed no emotion, or signs of life. Instead smoke just kept
> pouring out of holes where his mouth and optics should have been. He
> stepped forward, and swang a fist at Quake.
